subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN2181, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi there,

I have received my shakers and drivers, but the accessories packet with screws and such was not included (m4 x 10mm set screws). I am in Kununurra Western Australia, so obtaining the screws will be by order only. Can you send please.

Otherwise, the packaging was absolutely beautiful.

Many thanks,

Paul.


Sent from my iPhone

On 17 Aug 2025, at 09:28, SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> wrote:

﻿
Hello Paul, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

conversations.body_text: Hi Paul Webb,    We apologise for the inconvenience caused! We will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you! Please confirm whether only the screw is missing. If possible, please provide a photo so we can verify the issue.

Hi there,

It would be the screws that attach the shakers to the bracket which attaches to the pedals. There are four in each shaker, so 12 m4 x 10mm ‘bolts’.

Cheers for any assistance.

Regards,

Paul.

Sent from my iPad
Hi Paul Webb,    Okay, we have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you. Here is your tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045874634377
